title: Google Sheets Plugin

openaiSpec.name: googlesheet_plugin_001

range.description: The A1 notation of the range to read or update (e.g. 'Sheet1!A1:C10')

title.description: Title of the new spreadsheet (required if action=create)

action.description: Whether to read, write, or create a sheet

values.description: 2D array of values to update (required if writing data)

spreadsheetId.description: The ID of the Google Sheet (not needed if action=create)

openaiSpec.description: Interact with Google Sheets using OAuth2.0 authentication

userSettings.name: OAUTH_REDIRECT_URI
userSettings.label: OAuth Redirect URI
userSettings.description: The redirect URI configured in your Google Cloud OAuth2 credentials

overviewMarkdown:
## Google Sheets Plugin

Read, update, or create Google Sheets using OAuth2 authentication.
